pages.text: Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women que yi xindaole, qiu ni she you women de zuiguo, qiu ni shi women de mian yu huo yu de xingfa.”
Tamen shi jianren de, shi chengshi de, shi shuncong de, shi hao shi de, shi zai liming shi qiurao de
An la binggong zuozheng: Chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de; zhong tianshi he yiban xuezhe, ye zheyang zuozheng: Chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, ta shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de

An la suo xiyue de zongjiao, que shi yisilan jiao. Ceng shou tian jing de ren, zhiyou zai zhishi jianglin tamen zhihou, youyu huxiang jidu, cai fashengle fenqi. Shei buxin an la de jixiang,〔an la bujiu jiu yao chengzhi shei〕, yin wei an la que shi qingsuan shensu de zhu

Ruguo tamen yu ni zhenglun, ni jiu shuo:“Wo yi quanti guishun an la; shuncong wo de ren, ye guishun an la.” Ni dui ceng shou tian jing de ren he bu shi zi de ren shuo:“Nimen yijing guishunle ma?” Ruguo tamen guishun, name, tamen yi zunxun zhengdao. Ruguo tamen beiqi, name, ni zhi fu tongzhi de zeren. An la shi mingcha zhong pu de
Duiyu bu xin an la de jixiang, erqie wang sha zhong xianzhi, wang sha yi zhengyi ming ren zhe de ren, ni yingdang yi tongku de xingfa xiang tamen baoxi
Zhe deng ren de shangong, zai jinshi he houshi, wanquan wuxiao, tamen jue meiyou yuanzhu zhe
